title: I Just Wanted to White-wash - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Josei   Romance   Smut
tags: Ancient Times   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Interdimensional Travel   R*pe   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 小桑榆
description:
Su Yan, as a really good citizen, was unfathomably chosen by a system suddenly one day.

Su Yan: Why me???

Sir System: Because you are a good woman.

SuYan: #%*...

From then on, Su Yan traversed various worlds, white-washing all sorts of bad women. But...why is it that she was always eaten cleanly by lord male lead? What happened to aloof and self-restrained? What happened to staying away from sensuality? What happened to hating me? I just wanted to white-wash only!

The female lead ceaselessly transmigrates, white-washing all sorts of bad women, but always getting pushed down by the male lead...(novel is slightly Mary Sue, the plot serves the smut)>
